extensionDescription.message: Automate bulk price adjustments for Mercari Shops products

restoreDelayLabel.message: Restore Delay (元の価格に戻す時間)

orderThresholdPlaceholder.message: Number of orders to trigger restore (e.g., 3)

apiTokenPlaceholder.message: Enter your Personal API Access Token

errorInvalidInput.message: Please fill in all required fields with valid values

infoTitle.message: Welcome to Mercari Shops Price Automation

infoItem1.message: Automatically adjusts prices for all your shop products

infoItem2.message: Excludes products with pending shipments (発送待ち)

infoItem3.message: Restores original prices after a set time or when order threshold is reached

infoItem4.message: Runs in the background without interfering with your browsing

reqItem1.message: You must be logged into mercari-shops.com in this browser

reqItem2.message: The extension uses your browser session (no API tokens needed)

reqItem3.message: Make sure you're logged in before starting automation

infoNote.message: This setup will only appear once. Your Shop ID will be saved for future use.

shopIdHint.message: You can find your Shop ID in the URL when viewing your shop on mercari-shops.com

ipRegistrationDescription.message: Your IP address must be registered in the Mercari Shops admin panel before using the API. Go to Settings → API Settings → IP Whitelist.

useWebEndpointLabel.message: Use web endpoint (bypasses IP whitelist - requires login to mercari-shops.com)

testPageSubtitle.message: Test all API functionality for the extension

testPageNote.message: Note: Make sure you're logged into mercari-shops.com and have completed the initial setup with your Shop ID.

testConnectionDesc.message: Tests API connection using Self query

getShopIdDesc.message: Gets shop ID from API or storage

getProductDetailsDesc.message: Gets full product details for editing

gherkinTestsSubtitle.message: Run real automation scenarios with live price changes and countdown timers

gherkinTestsWarning.message: ⚠️ Warning: These tests will actually change product prices on your Mercari Shops account. Use with caution!

scenario1Desc.message: Tests standard discount calculation. Products will be discounted and then restored after the delay.

scenario2Title.message: Scenario 2: Minimum Price Floor (300 yen) Inverted Behavior

scenario2Desc.message: Tests products that would go below 300 yen - they should be increased instead of discounted.

scenario3Desc.message: Tests that products with orders in "Waiting for shipment" status are excluded from price changes.
